questions.question: What Is The Equation For Probabilistic?
What Is The Input And Output Of Step 3 - Apply Implication Method?

answers.a: Input is a fuzzy set but the output is a whole value
answers.b: Input is a whole value but the output can be a fuzzy set
answers.c: Input and output have the same value
answers.d: Input is a smaller value than the output value

questions.question: Mamdani's Fuzzy Inference Method Was Designed To Attempt What?

answers.a: Control any two combinations of any two products by synthesising a set of linguistic control rules obtained from experienced human operations.
answers.b: Control a television and remote combination by synthesising a set of linguistic control rules obtained from experienced human operations.
answers.c: Control a steam engine and a boiler combination by synthesising a set of linguistic control rules obtained from experienced human operations.
answers.d: Control a air craft and feul level combination by synthesising a set of linguistic control rules obtained from experienced human operations

questions.question: What Is The Input And Output Of Step 2 - Apply Fuzzy Operator?

answers.a: The input is a single truth value and the output has two or more values
answers.b: The input is a value greater than one and the output is a value less than the input
answers.c: The input and output have both the same values
answers.d: The input has two or more values and the output has a single truth value

questions.question: What Is The Purpose Of Aggregation?

answers.a: To gather all the different fuzzy set outputs and combine them into a single fuzzy set outputs
answers.b: To gather all the possible inputs and use the average to gain an output
answers.c: To gather all the different fuzzy set outputs and average them out to get a single value
answers.d: To subtract all the output fuzzy set values from the input values
